column5: Will be traveling from SW Ohio to Ontario for annual fishing trip on 6/13. Any info on the highway project in Detroit to the Ambassadore bridge would be appreciated. I would rather not go to Niagra Falls, but...... Thanks in advance
Youll be fine.. I-75 closes down at Clark avenue and has direct access to the bridge. Cross there atleast weekly,, no problems at all. Enjoy your trip

Thanks a bunch, Windsor, feel much better that I dont have to go clear to NY. I really appreciate it.
